title: Greek National Water Company - Water Management System - Channel
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic water system made for raw-water supply management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water management vertical and related IoT applications. This entity represents either a system composed by different components (e.g., channels, junctions, cross-sections etc) or just a component (e.g., simulation of a spillway)

description.description: A free text description for the system

rightSideSlope.description: The slope of the right bank of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

bottomWidth.description: The bottom width of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

isComposedOf.description: Reference to the ID of an entity of type Channel, cross-section, Junction, Regulation structure, Regulation gate, Spillway.

hasSubSystem.description: Relationship. Model: '../OpenChannelSystem/schema.json'. Reference to the ID of a water sub-system, considered as a water system - an entity of type WaterSystem.
